com.ibm.team.build.ant.task
Class PluginOrganizerTask

java.lang.Object
  Task
      com.ibm.team.build.ant.task.PluginOrganizerTask

public class PluginOrganizerTask
extends Task

Task which takes a source directory of plugin and feature directories and moves them to a target directory with plugins and features subdirectories. If the plugins and features subdirectories don't exist in the target, they are created. This is the directory structure that eclipse pdebuild requires.

A directory is considered a feature directory if it contains a feature.xml file. All other directories are considered plugin directories regardless of whether or not they contain a plugin.xml or manifest.mf file.

The if the target plugin and feature directories already exist, the move may not succeed and no error is given. 

        sourceDirectory before task runs:
            com.ibm.team.build
            com.ibm.team.build.feature
        targetDirectory after task runs:
            plugins/com.ibm.team.build
            features/com.ibm.team.build.feature

Required attributes are:

  • sourceDirectory - The directory that contains the plugin and feature directories.
  • targetDirectory - The directory that the plugin and feature directories will be moved to.
